visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should include monthly rainfall data for a year. Additionally, the chart should have custom colors for the series and include settings for chart margins, background, and legend.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a spline chart with a title 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The chart type is set to 'spline', and the background color is light gray (#f9f9f9). The chart has custom margins to ensure it is not too close to the edges of the container. The x-axis categories represent the months of the year, and the y-axis title indicates the unit of measurement (mm). Both axes have styled labels with a specific color and font size. The data series includes monthly rainfall data, and the series is colored green (#4CAF50). The legend is enabled and styled with a dark gray color and a specific font size. Additionally, the navigation buttons have custom themes for hover and select states.
